name: Braveless
description:
Braveless is an action-puzzle adventure game where a good-for-nothing protagonist is forced to venture into dangerous dungeons. 
In over his head, only his wits can save him now…

I've been working fulltime on this project for the past 6 months, and I hope to make it my first released game! I will create prototypes targetting different subjects and upload them to this page once they're done.
This first prototype is about puzzle-solving.
Solve the puzzles and get to the end of the first dungeon (~30minutes).


To support the project, please consider: 

  • Donating (funds the game's development and is greatly appreciated)
  • Rating ("rate the game" is located on the top right corner of this page)
  • Following:  Mailing List / Twitter / Facebook / Discord

You can get automatic updates if you launch the game using the itch app

Thank you for playing! 

Art is still rough and there are no sounds.
New prototypes targetting different subjects are coming, so stay in touch :)

What do you think of Braveless? I'm very interested to hear your opinion! (Showing me videos of your playthrough is extra useful)
